dialogue: Carol, move my flight one hour earlier Friday.
Do you have any idea how hard that would be?
I know it sounds easy, but it won't be. Not at this late date. Not with all your pickiness.
When I fail, you will think I didn't look hard enough for a new flight.
I can't prove a negative, so I will forever suffer your disdain.
Why is it so hard to ask you to do anything?
I've been telling people you're stupid, but I'm open to other theories.
